diseases.remedy: Honey as solvent and stimulant; dietary moderation
diseases.method: Use honey to open pores and assist menstrual flow; follow humoral advice
diseases.dose: 1–2 tbsp honey in warm water; applied case-by-case
diseases.source: Natural Healing with the Medicine of the Prophet — honey properties (eases menstrual discharge)
diseases.remedy_description: Honey as a solvent appears as a smooth golden liquid; used historically to aid digestion and stimulate bowel movements. More images: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Honey

diseases.method: Use dietary diuretics and laxatives; historically use camel products
diseases.dose: Case dependent; historical mentions of small daily quantities
diseases.source: Natural Healing with the Medicine of the Prophet — Dropsy section
diseases.remedy_description: Camel milk is a thin white liquid; in traditional texts it's mentioned alongside diuretics and laxatives for dropsy treatment. More images: https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Camel_milk
